about_the_game:
The new companion album to Street Cleaner 3, Street Cleaner's "3" isn't just a soundtrack, it's an all new Street Cleaner experience.

All the heavy dark synth, white knuckle outrun, and trademark Street Cleaner stings, with plenty of new surprise twists as well. From the break-beat thrashing of Enter the Hyper Detonator, to the Asian inspired pair of Shodown and Big Trouble, and to the synthwave/western fusion of My Name is Nobody you're sure to have a wild time with the new Street Cleaner.

Also features the new perilous hip-hop anthem It Ain't Safe by NormallyRetro.

Cover art by Kapps! of Mad Monk Tattoo, Las Vegas.

name: Street Cleaner 3 Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 110 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 700 MB available space

short_description: The latest album from Street Cleaner. Not just the companion album to Street Cleaner 3 the game, but a genre-bending epic album in itself with all the heavy dark synth, white knuckle outrun, and trademark Street Cleaner stings you expect, and a a whole lot of new surprises.
